extendedInfo.description: +++ Get your personal Speak-App-Collection NOW - Search for 'holfeld' and find all the languages you are interested in +++ESSENTIAL phrases for your trips to Germany. HEAR&LEARN how to speak perfectly pronounced German. QUICK and USEFUL! Instead of learning 1000 unnecessary words, learn these 100 essential phrases! Clear audio recordings! Very EASY to use!The 100 Most IMPORTANT Spoken GERMAN Phrases! The easiest way ever!If you want to have a great time while traveling in GERMANY, AUSTRIA or SWITZERLAND, you need to know these phrases or at least have them at hand. You will make great friends in GERMANY if you: SPEAK GERMAN!Most Apps or classes try to teach you 1000s of words you will never need. This App teaches you all the phrases you will very likely need!If you want to save time and money and just learn what you'll actually need while traveling, this App is ideal for you! Hear & Learn the basics, how to say Hello, Thanks, Goodbye and if you are good in the basics, learn a few more fun phrases while meeting people at parties or in a club/bar.FEATURES:+ clear audio recordings of a native German speaker+ just 1 click to hear the pronunciation+ 14 phrases on each category site+ 7 Categories (in the full version)+ Basics & Emergency+ Travel, Business & Events + Leisure & Relationships+ very easy to use+ works offlineWhenever you visit a German-speaking city like Munich, Dresden, Hamburg, Berlin, Stuttgart or Frankfurt, you will be able to speak to the local people.This App will help you to have a great time and to be SUCCESSFUL in many ways in Germany, Austria and Switzerland!

reviews.title: GREAT APP
reviews.comment: QUICKEST/MOST EFFECTIVE WAY TO LEARN/SPEAK THE LANGUAGE OF YOUR CHOICE FLUENTLY.
reviews.author: ANDRE REED

reviews.title: German translater.
reviews.comment: Its works well. It gives simple needed translations. I love it! And now I know how to pronounce danke!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CAUTION: unreasonable permissions
reviews.comment: I don\'t trust this at all. Too many permissions, and just now it gave me a notification just reminding me to use the app.  Not good at all, there are plenty of other similar apps out there. Don\'t install.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: uh..
reviews.comment: it seems a little half assed... the widget \"word of the day\" type thing displays the most bizarre and unnecessary words I could imagine, lots of technical jargon words...rarely anything useful, just words like \"abacterial\" and \"wave front aberration\".. bist du mir verarschen!?
reviews.author: Dave Lawson

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Download if u want to learn basic german...was expecting more...... in trail version
reviews.author: Mahesh Parmar

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: I really like it, I can practice on the go
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Google could do a better job!
reviews.comment: All that it offers are a hand full of basic phrase, numbers, etc... some of which I will never use and it lacks many that would. #Fail! I have found a couple that do much better: Tourist Language, Google Translate, even German Dictionary. Go figure!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deutschland
reviews.comment: Good way to start , I like the clear pronounced words
